reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 200/15: TRANSPORTATION OF PUPILS IN SCHOOLS OPERATED BY THE MINISTRY
reg_info.reg_name_text: TRANSPORTATION OF PUPILS IN SCHOOLS OPERATED BY THE MINISTRY

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “school” means a school established under section 13 of the Act; (“école”) “Superintendent” means the Superintendent of a school for the blind or a school for the deaf established under section 13 of the Act. (“surintendant”)
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“school” means a school established under section 13 of the Act; (“école”)

“Superintendent” means the Superintendent of a school for the blind or a school for the deaf established under section 13 of the Act. (“surintendant”)

content.section: Transportation for pupils not in residence
content.content: 2. The Superintendent may provide daily transportation to and from a school for pupils who are not in residence at the school.
content.raw_html: 2. The Superintendent may provide daily transportation to and from a school for pupils who are not in residence at the school.

content.content: 3. The Minister may provide transportation to and from a school once a week for pupils who are in residence at the school.
content.raw_html: 3. The Minister may provide transportation to and from a school once a week for pupils who are in residence at the school.

content.content: 4. The Minister or Superintendent may provide for a pupil who is admitted to a school transportation to and from an activity that is part of the program of the school.
content.raw_html: 4. The Minister or Superintendent may provide for a pupil who is admitted to a school transportation to and from an activity that is part of the program of the school.

content.content: 5. The Minister may pay all or part of the transportation costs for a pupil admitted to a school if the pupil’s parents or guardians reside in Ontario.
content.raw_html: 5. The Minister may pay all or part of the transportation costs for a pupil admitted to a school if the pupil’s parents or guardians reside in Ontario.

content.content: 6. For the purposes of sections 3 and 4, the Minister may make an agreement or agreements with a corporation, commission or person for the transportation of pupils.
content.raw_html: 6. For the purposes of sections 3 and 4, the Minister may make an agreement or agreements with a corporation, commission or person for the transportation of pupils.

content.raw_html: 7. Omitted (amends, repeals or revokes other legislation).
